name: UnicornHeaven
description:
Ever wondered what it feels like to be a unicorn plushie? now you can!
Come and experience what being a product of ultra capitalism and mass production feels like! /s

Actually it's just that I REALLY like my small family of stuffed unicorns at home and as an IT student I wanted to make them alive in my computer, enjoy!

PS. if you want a feature or something, you can ask if you want to. might add things later.

ho and by the way you need  4 TITAN V in SLI to run this thing, because I'm too lazy to optimize. sorry
